title: Polestar 1 Hero Car
subtitle: Special Cars
text: Finally in Patch 1.5 the cover car arrived in the Game!

title: Most Op Car ingame
subtitle: OP Cars
text: This is the most Overpowerd Car in the Game. With the best engine Swap is very fast and has good cornering!

title: Best Acceleration Car
subtitle: OP Cars
text: The Ford Gt is the best acceleration car ingame right now, its only a bit slower than the RSR.

title: Port Murphy
subtitle: Tips
text: If you got a high Heat Level then go to Port Murphy and Jump on a Container, most of the Time the Cops can't follow you and you can Escape easely
